loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es: Adolfo, de 45 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive solo en la casa que le heredaron sus padres y lo que más desea es sobre salir en la vida. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo a conseguido Adolfo, son el principal sustento que tiene, tanto la papa como la arveja, son productos muy solicitados en el mercado mayorista de Tarma, ya que su fama de cosechar cultivos de buena calidad, le ayuda a vender sus productos a muy buenos precios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plaga de insectos que pueden perjudicar la producción de estos productos. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de papa y arveja, ya que son muy pesados y le cansan mucho. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras, para poder ampliar su producción. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los dos mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará abono, para hacer más fértiles sus tierras.
texts.en:
Adolfo is 45 years old and a simple, hard-working man who lives alone in the house he inherited from his parents.  His greatest desire is to be successful in life.  Adolfo has planted his fields with a great deal of effort, and they are the principal source of his livelihood. He grows potatoes and peas, products that are in high demand at the wholesale market in Tarma.  His reputation for growing high-quality crops helps him to sell his products at very good prices.

The part he most enjoys about his work is protecting his seedlings from the insect plagues that can damage production.  He has 15 years of experience in this type of work and he considers the most difficult thing to be transporting the sacks of potatoes and peas, as they are very heavy and it tires him out.  In the future, he hopes to buy more land so he can increase his production.

This is his sixth loan through Microfinanzas Prisma and he knows that this support will be very beneficial towards developing his work.  Among his communal bank, he is a very cheerful member who always brings order to their meetings.  He will use this 2,000 nuevos soles to buy fertilizer to make his fields more fertile.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Las Estrellitas Group

texts.es:
El grupo se Llama las Estrellitas y se ubica en el Barrio Costa de Oro de Tecpatan, Estado de Chiapas México. Se integra de cinco señoras que viven en el mismo barrio, la razón del nombre es porque como son puras señoras se consideran unas estrellitas.

      La señora Irma Vázquez Vázquez es la representante del grupo y es la que se le entrevisto, vive en unión libre con el señor Fernando  López C., con el cual procreo dos hijas: Ana Gabriela de  nueve años en cuarto de primaria y la más pequeña es María Fernanda de cuatro años de edad.

      Ella se dedica a vender  lo que son productos agrícolas como son: pinol, polvillo, tascalate, como también refrescos, y solicito el préstamo para comprar ingredientes, como son: canela, maíz, cacao para prepararlo y no limitarse con su venta.
     Se inspiro en esta actividad para ganar su propio dinero  y apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa, inicio con esta actividad desde hace dos años y cuatro meses  donde le va muy bien, aun que tiene que salir a las comunidades cercanas a vender su mercancía para sacar mejores ganancias.

     Con la ganancia que obtiene compra más ingredientes  para seguir elaborando su actividad, y su clientela le siga comprando para  obtener mejores ingreso,  así poder ahorrar para comprar materiales para construir su casa más grande para que sus hijas estén más cómodas y felices.

    Lo que ella quiere es seguir trabajando el préstamo, para que con las ganancia que obtenga pueda ahorrar, así construir su casa que es lo que tanto desean tener, como también darle lo mejor a sus  hijas en su crecimiento.
    Las personas que integran el grupo son cinco y son las siguientes:

  Blanca Luz E. Bermúdez: invierte el préstamo en la compra de mercancía para surtir su tienda de abarrotes como son: azúcar, aceite, frijol, avena, entre otros.

   Irma Vázquez Vázquez: invierte el préstamo para comprar ingredientes como son. Canela, maíz, cacao, para elaborar: polvillo, tascalate y también vende refresco.

   Dora María López Benavente: invierte el préstamo para la compra de mercancía para su tienda de abarrotes, como son: aceite, atún, sardina, frijol entre otros.

   Florinda G. González: compra frutas de la temporada como son: mango, plátano y naranjas para venderlo en la misma región.

   Bertha C. Sánchez: invierte el préstamo para la compra de pollos por reja y venderlo aliñado.
texts.en:
This group is called “Las Estrellitas” (The Little Stars) and is located in the “Costa de Oro” neighborhood of Tecpatan, in the State of Chiapas, Mexico.  It’s made up of five young ladies who live in the same neighborhood.  They chose this name because the members of the group are all women and they consider themselves to be stars (like stars in the sky.)

Irma Vázquez was interviewed as the group’s representative.  She lives with her husband, Fernando López C., and they have two children; nine year old Ana Gabriela, who is in the fourth grade; and four year old María Fernanda.

She sells products produced on the farm, such as pinol (a corn meal), pinolillo (corn meal with cacao), and tascalate (a chocolate drink).  She also sells soft drinks.  She requested this loan to buy ingredients, such as cinnamon, dried corn, and cacao to prepare her products and not be limited in her sales.  

She was inspired to start this business two years and four months ago so that she could earn her own money and be able to help her husband with the household income.  Things have been going well for her, but she has to travel to the nearby communities to sell her wares in order to create better profits.

She uses her profits to buy more ingredients so that she can keep up her activities and so that her customers will continue to buy from her and she can increase her income.  In this way she can save up some money to buy building materials so that she can add onto her home so that her daughters can be more comfortable and happy.

She wants to continue working with this loan so that she can save more of her earnings and build her home, which is what she wants very much, as well as giving her daughters the best as they grow. 

There are five members of the group and they are:

Blanca Luz E. Bermúdez – She will use the money from this loan to invest in merchandise to stock her grocery store; items such as sugar, cooking oil, beans, and oatmeal among other things.

Irma Vázquez Vázquez – She will buy ingredients such as cinnamon, dried corn, and cacao to make polvillo and tascalate.  She also sells soft drinks.

Dora María López Benavente – She will buy merchandise for her grocery store; such as cooking oil, tuna, sardines, and beans among other things.

Florinda G. González – She buys seasonal fruits such as mango, bananas, and oranges to resell in the same region.

Bertha C. Sánchez – She buys and sells chickens

loans.use: Supplies and ingredients

loans.name: Carlos Roberto

texts.es:
el señor Carlos Roberto E. L. tiene 26 años de edad, esta casado y no tiene hijos que dependen de el, Carlos se dedica al servicio de reparacion de automoviles en su taller, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 07 años.
gracias a las ganancias que le genera el negocio contruyo su casa y tiene un vehiculo en donde se transporta para ir a su trabajo ya que el radica en la aldea corinto a 500 mts de la refinadora DESAL.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de herramientas y mejorar su equipo de trabajo.  su mayor anhelo es que sus ingresos sean mejores cada dia para asi darle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos Roberto E. L. is 26 years old.  He is married, but doesn’t have any children.  Carlos repairs automobiles in his workshop and has been doing this for seven years.

He was able to have his house built thanks to the income that this business generates for him.  He also has a car that he uses to go to work, now that he is located in the Corinto hamlet, 500 meters from the DESAL refinery.

He will use the money from this loan to buy tools and improve his equipment.  His greatest desire is to increase his profits daily, in order to give a better quality of life to his wife and future children.

loans.use: Tools

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Ángel, de 37 años, es un padre de familia muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Noemí de 28 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo al que se dedica Ángel, es la siembra de papas y arvejas, los cuales después de cosecharlos, vende en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Él tiene varios clientes, que sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todo al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus chacras de la plaga de insectos. En adelante, espera comprar o alquilar nuevas tierras para ampliar su producción. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, si desea acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. En su banco comunal, es un socio muy responsable y preocupado por el bienestar de su grupo. Con los mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en: Ángel is 37 years old and is the hard-working father of a very simple family. He lives in his own house with his wife Noemí, who is 28 years old, and their three children. He wants to offers his children a better quality of life. Ángel grows potatoes and peas. After he harvests them, he sells them in the largest market in the city of Tarma. He has various clients, and because they know the quality of his products, they do not compare his crops with others. His favorite part of his work is sowing his land and making it fertile and productive. He has spent 25 years pursuing this activity, and the most difficult part of his work is protecting his farms from insects. Going forward, he hopes to buy or rent new land to increase his production. This is his sixth loan with MFP, and he knows that he has to make his repayments on time if he wants to take out another loan in the future. Within his community bank, he is very responsible and is concerned about the well-being of his group. With the 1000 nuevos soles that he is requesting, he will buy more fertilizer to improve his harvests.

loans.use: To buy more bags of fertilizer

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza 2 Group

texts.es:
Emilio es uno D. L. miembros del grupo La nueva esperanza 2, elL. son microempresarios dedicados a las ventas D. ropa, productos naturales, zapatos, educacion, etc; en la ciudad D. San Pedro D. Macoris, una ciudad famosa por sus jugadores D. pelota y por la industria azucarera, su economía actual depenD. D. la Zona franca, la industria del cemento y otras actividades menores como el turismo. Está asociado D. Esperanza inicio con su primer prestamo y actualmente llega 3 años y esta recibiendo su septimo prestamo, en cada uno ha realizado sus pagos satisfactoriamente y ha realizado buenas inversiones, se ha dedicado al comercio D. ventas miscelaneas, zapatos, cosmeticos, ropas, etc.

Emilio está planificando invertir su nuevo préstamo en la compra D. ropas, productos cosmeticos, zapatos. El va a utilizar sus ganancias para ahorrar para asi poder construir su casa. Su actividad favorita es escuchar musica, y su reto es mantenerse fiel con L. prestamos para asi poder seguir invirtiendo en su negocio. Su sueño es mejorar su condicion social y poder comprar un vehiculo granD., como una camioneta o camion.
texts.en:
Emilio is one of the members of the group La Nueva Esperanza 2 (New Hope 2). They are micro-entrepreneurs dedicated to selling clothing, natural goods, shoes, education, etc. They work in the city of San Pedro D. Macoris, a city famous for its athletes and sugar industry. At present, its economy depends on the duty-free industry zones, the cement industry, and other minor activities like tourism. This member is receiving his seventh loans three years after receiving his first. In each loan, he has maD. his repayments on time and has maD. good investments. He sells miscellaneous items, shoes, cosmetics, clothing, etc.

Emilio is planning to invest his new loan to buy clothing, cosmetics, and shoes. He will use his earnings to save so that he can build a house. He enjoys listening to music, and his goal is to remain faithful with the loans so that he can continue investing in his business. His dream is to improve his social condition and to buy a large vehicle, like a truck or a pick-up truck.

loans.use: To buy different products including cosmetics and shoes

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es: Cirilo, de 65 años, es un hombre que siempre ha luchado por sobresalir en la vida, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su esposa Abelarda de 65 años y lo que más desea es tener una vejez tranquila. Cuando era niño, los padres de Cirilo le enseñaron todo lo que debía saber de la chacra y poco a poco se fue encargando de las tierras de sus padres, ya que sus hermanos decidieron dedicarse a otras actividades. Ahora tiene extensas tierras de cultivo, en las cuales cosecha papa, arveja, maíz y habas, para luego venderlos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, ya que es la actividad que le da de comer a su familia, lleva 37 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil, es cuidar sus productos de la plaga de insectos. Con el tiempo, desea alquilar tierras de sus vecinos, para incrementar su producción. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es un socio muy solidario con el resto de sus compañeras. Con los quinientos nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más fertilizantes para sus cultivos.
texts.en: Cirilo is 65 years old. He is has always been someone that has worked hard to succeed in life.  He lives in a rented home together with his wife, Alejandra, 65 years old. What he most wishes for is to have a happy retirement. When he was a little boy his parents taught him all that he needed to know about agriculture. And slowly he started to take charge of the family plantations. His brothers and sisters chose different ways to make their living. Now he has extensive stretches of land where he harvests potatoes, pea, corn, and fava beans. He sells his products in the wholesaler's market in the city of Tarma. What he most enjoys about his work is cultivating the fields, especially because this is the way he is able to feed this family. He has 37 years in the business. The most difficult part of the work has to ward off any insect plagues. In time he hopes to rent the neighboring fields to increase his production. This is the third loan he accesses from MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He has always been timely with his payments and he hopes to retain his record. In his community bank he is very committed to working with the other members. The fifteen hundred nuevos soles she requests will purchase fertilizers for his plantations.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel  de Jesus M. C., de 49 años de edad, casado, docente,Tiene tres hijos  de 19, 15 y 9 años de edad, los cuales estan estudiando, la esposa es maestra de secundaria y le ayuda en los gastos del hogar.

  El Sr. M. C.  labora para el Ministerio de Educación desde hace 22 años desempeñandose con gran responsabilidad y honestidad. 

 Esta solicitando su 7mo. credito para comprar zing y ponerle parte del techo que le falta a su casita que junto a su esposa han venido construyendo.  Su sueño es continuar trabajando con financiamientos que le brinda Afodenic para de esta manera mejorar cada dia mas su vivienda y brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesus M. C. is 49 years old; he is married and he is a teacher. He has three children, aged 19, 15, and 9 years old. They are all attending school. His wife is a high school teacher and she contributes to the household expenses. 

Mr. M. C. has worked for the Ministry of Education for the past 22 years, working with great responsibility and honesty.

He requests a seventh loan to purchase roofing materials to install the roof on the house that he and his wife have been building. His dream is to keep up with the loans provided through Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) and to continue building their home, and to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: To replace a roof.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix, de 42 años, es un hombre muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Nancy de 36 años y sus 7 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. La siembra de papa, habas y arveja es la actividad a la que se dedica Félix, todas las mañanas trabaja sus tierras para poderlas hacer más fértiles y productivas. Sus cultivos los lleva a vender al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde obtiene muy buenos precios, debido a la buena calidad de sus cultivos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden perjudicar su producción. Lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta el mercado. Con el tiempo, espera comprar o alquilar nuevas tierras, con las cuales pueda incrementar su producción. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, si no desea causarle problemas a su banco comunal, en el cual es un socio muy responsable y puntual. Con los tres mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en: Felix is 42 years old and he is a very happy and hard working individual. He lives in a home that he owns together with his wife Nancy, 36 years old, and their 7 beloved children. He wishes to provide them with a better quality of life.  Felix's business is the harvest of potatoes, fava beans and peas. Every morning he sets out for his fields and works to make them more fertile and more productive. He brings the harvest to the wholesalers' market in Tarma. There, he is able to acquire very good prices for his products, given their excellent quality. What he most enjoys about his work warding off plagues that may decimate production. He has had 5 years in the field and in time he hopes to purchase or rent more land to increase production. This is his sixth loan through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he is committed to making his payments on time, not wanting to cause any trouble for his community bank. He is a very responsible and punctual member of the bank. The three thousand nuevos soles he requests will be used to purchase more fertilizer for his plantations.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel, de 31 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Elizabeth de 28 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Los campos de cultivo, han sido en la vida de Joel, una actividad necesaria para vivir, ya que desde muy pequeño sus padres siempre le enseñaron que trabajando en la chacra nada le faltaría, es por eso que decidió continuar con esta labor familiar y ahora tiene sus propios cultivos, donde tiene sembrados papa, arveja y flores, los cuales una vez cosechados llevará a vender al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar, ya que sabe que de esta actividad depende la tranquilidad de su familia, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de los cambios bruscos del clima, ya que eso afecta mucho su productividad. Para más adelante, desea seguir trabajando duro y mejorando sus cultivos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte será muy beneficioso en el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy respetado. Con los tres mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en: Joel is 31 years old and he is a very simple and hard working person. He lives in his own home together with his wife Elizabeth, 28 years old, and their three beloved children. He wishes to provide them with a better quality of life. Cultivating farm land for Joel's life has been a necessary part of living. Since he was very young his parents always taught him to work the land so he will never want for anything. He decided to continue on in the family business and now he has his own fields where he harvests potatoes, peas, and flowers. Once harvested, he takes the products for sale in the wholesalers' market in the city of Tarma. What he most enjoys about his work is sowing the fields, knowing that this business is what provides for his family. He has 8 years in the business. The most difficult part of the work is having to cope with the sudden changes in weather because it impacts productivity. In the future he hopes to keep working hard to improve his plantations. This is the fifth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He knows that this support will be very beneficial in the development of his business. He is a very responsible member of the community bank and he is well respected for it. The three thousand nuevos soles he requests will be used to purchase more fertilizer for his plantations.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
la señora Maria del Carmen O. G. tiene 58 años de edad, vive en la Colonia San Francisco de la ciudad e San Lorenzo, tiene 5 años de residir en este domicilio y se dedica a la compra y venta de lacteos como ser queso seco, semi seco, ahumado, fresco, quesillo y mantequilla, dichos porductos los vende a sus clientes mayoristas y al detalle.
el credito lo utilizara para invertirlos en su negocio para la compra de mas productos lacteos y asi poder mejorar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
las ventas han mejorado y sus clientes le hacen pedidos grandes y no puede cubrir con las necesidades de todos sus clientes es por esa razon que necesita comprar mas lacteos.
texts.en:
Maria Del Carmen O. G. is 58 years old and she lives in the community of San Francisco in the city of San Lorenzo. She has lived for the past 5 years in the same location and her business is buying and selling milk products such as dried cheeses, fresh cheese, smoked cheese, cottage cheese, and butter. She sells her products to wholesalers but she also sells retail. The loan will be used to invest in the business, to purchase more milk products and to improve her income and their quality of life. 

Sales have been improving and her clients are placing large orders and she is unable to meet the demand of all of her clients. She needs to purchase more goods.

loans.use: To purchase cheeses and butter.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ambrosio

texts.en:
Ambrosio is a 50-year-old pepper producer who lives with his family in the region of Upala in the northern part of Costa Rica, minutes from the Nicaraguan border. Ambrosio is a dedicated farmer. He plans to focus his efforts on the planting and harvest of cayenne peppers. He works to strike a balance between accomplishing the daily tasks associated with agricultural production and the completion of domestic responsibilities. The land he works is his own. In addition to his agricultural activity, Ambrosio feels it is important to be an active member of his community. As a result, he dedicates a significant portion of his time to community meetings, groups and events (for example, the Board of Education and the Local Producers Association). The rural zone where Ambrosio lives is sparsely populated with infrequent bus service and a general lack of infrastructure. Ambrosio is working hard – striving to reap the maximum benefits from his land and his labour. 

Although this is an individual loan, the community in which Ambrosio and his family live is very close-knit and interdependent. Neighbours help and support one another by sharing experiences and expertise acquired over the years. All individual members of the Upala community are dedicated to the improvement of living conditions for the region as a whole.

This loan will be used to finance the production of cayenne peppers. Specifically, the loan will be used to finance the purchase of a variety of necessary agricultural nutrients, fertilizers and chemicals in order to ensure a healthy harvest. All labour and logistical tasks associated with production will be carried out by Ambrosio. The productive cycle (from planting to harvest) for these types of peppers is roughly one year. Ambrosio planted his peppers 4 months ago and will expect to harvest in the next 8 months. Typically, he dedicates the hours from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM everyday to his agricultural activities. 

Piper and Capiscum Processors Compañía Agrícola Industrial, or PROPICA, is an international buyer and seller of chili pepper and ground pepper products. In cooperation with Fundación Mujer, PROPICA has guaranteed to purchase the agricultural products (the peppers) that are to be produced with the help of this loan. PROPICA acts as a guaranteed client for small agricultural producers in the area of Upala, thus ensuring that their products will reach market. 

The main obstacle Ambrosio and other producers in the Upala community face is a lack of access to working capital funds. The collaboration of Fundación Mujer and PROPICA represents a unique opportunity for Ambrosio, his family and community. By offering a source of start-up capital and a guaranteed client to purchase what is produced, there is a chance to improve living conditions for Ambrosio as well as the community at large. Above all, Ambrosio wants to take advantage of the current opportunity that has been presented – he wants to profit from this collaboration and see improvements in his home and neighbourhood.

loans.use: For the purchase of agricultural nutrients and chemicals

loans.name: Lourdes Suyapa

texts.es:
la señora Lourdes Suyapa B. V. tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la Colonia San Francisco de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, vive en union libre con el sr. Benigno Zamora.
la señora Lourdes se dedica a la elaboracion de golosinas como ser tacos, enchiladas, pasteles entre otros , tambien a la compra y venta de lacteos.
sus productos los vende en su casa de habitacion con vecinos, amigos y familiares que le visitan. la señora lourdes tiene 1 año de dedicarse a este tipo de negocio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de queso, quesillo y mantequilla, este tipo de comida se vende rapido ya que se acompaña casi en los tres tiempos de comidas, desayuno, almuerzo y cena.
texts.en:
Lourdes Suyapa B. V. is 39 years old and she lives in the community of San Francisco in the city of San Lorenzo. She lives together with her partner, Mr. Benigno Zamora. Lourdes makes snacks such as tacos, enchiladas, cakes and other products. She also participates in the buying and selling of milk products.

She makes her sales from her home, selling to neighbors, friends and family. Lourdes has had 1 year in the business. The loan will be used to purchase cheese, cottage cheese and butter. This kind of food is sold out quickly, especially because it is consumed during the three meals, breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

loans.use: To purchase cheeses and butter.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Delia Hermelinda

texts.es:
La Señora Delia es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive en la comunidad de San Miguel que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle,  su población se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura que es  para su consumo y el sobrante lo vende, mucha de su población ha emigrado en busca de un mejor futuro para sus familias.
 
Nuestra socia  tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos,el primero de 4 años y su segundo hijo de apenas 7 meses de edad, su esposo trabaja conduciendo maquinaria pesada, con el trabajo conyugal han construido su casa propia.

Doña Delia se dedica a trabajar en su pequeña tienda la cual la tiene hace 15 años, labora desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche de domingo a domingo, también  cría gallinas y tiene una vaca.
 
Es socia de la banca comunal hace 8 años y los créditos le han beneficiado en su negocio, ahora su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su tienda como arroz, azúcar, galletas, etc.
 
Su mayor sueño es conservar su salud para poder trabajar como hasta ahora lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
Delia is a member of the community bank named "The Swan". She lives in the community of San Miguel in the region of Parroquia Del Valle. The population is made up of farmers and agriculturists whose products are used for both personal consumption and for sale. Much of the population has emigrated in search for better a better future for their families. 

Delia is 42 years old. She is married and she has 2 children. The eldest is 4 years old and the youngest is only 7 months old. Her husband is a heavy machinery operator and together they have built their own house.

Delia works in a small store that she has had for more than 15 years. She works from 7 in the morning until 8 in the evening, 7 days a week. She also raises chickens and she has a cow. 

She has been a member of the community bank for the past 8 years and the loans she has received have greatly benefited her business. This loan will be invested in the purchase of grocery items to stock her store, such as: rice, sugar, cookies, etc.

Her greatest dream is to remain healthy enough to keep working, as she has to date.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, rice, cooking oil, eggs, cookies etc.

loans.name: Catalina Huanca Group

texts.es:
Sinónimo D. perseverancia es Catalina Huanca, un grupo D. mujeres optimistas y  luchadoras. Este grupo lleva ya formado 4 años, con 9 socias que son ejemplo D. mujeres. La confianza que hay entre ellas no solo transcurre por el tiempo que llevan como grupo, también a su vez son vecinas y viven en la zona D. Catalina Huanca por ello el nombre del grupo.
 Seria grato comentar D. cada una D. las integrantes pero faltarían palabras. Por tanto mencionaremos a la señora Giuliana Sánchez, una integrante D. 40 años D. edad esposa y madre D. 3 hijos. Ella comienza su labor diaria con la venta D. productos naturales, el cual le ha dado muchos frutos económicos desD. hace más D. 3 años, pudiendo ahorrar para los gastos D. la casa y los estudios D. sus hijos en el colegio. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en mejoras D. su negocio e implementación del mismo. Catalina Huanca un grupo D. mujeres que con esmero y dedicación saben salir adelante con el paso D. cada día.
texts.en:
Catalina Huanca is synonymous with perserverance. It is a group of optimistic women who are fighters. This group was formed four years ago with 9 members who are exemplary. The trust between them exists not only because they are in the group together, but because they are also neighbors and live in the Catalina Huanca area, and that is where the group's name comes from.  

It would be nice to be able to comment on each member, but there aren't enough words. Therefore, we'll mention Mrs.Giuliana Sánchez, a 40 year old member who is a wife and mother of 3 children. She starts her daily work selling natural products. This has given her a lot of economic benefit for more than 3 years. She has been able to save for household expenses and her children's high school educations. With this loan, she will invest in business improvements and the outfitting of the same. Catalina Huanca is a group of women with care and dedication who know how to get ahead every day.

loans.use: She will invest in business improvement and in its outfitting.

loans.name: Las Amistosas 1 Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Amistosas decidió llamarse así porque todas se consideran alegres y sociables entre sí, se llevan todas muy bien, es por eso que decidieron formar el grupo y pedir crédito, el grupo se formó en el Estado de México.
La señora Martha García R.,  tiene una tienda de abarrotes, la cual surgió por la inquietud de tener un trabajo y distraerse, pero al paso del tiempo le fue interesando más el negocio de los abarrotes es por eso que ya tiene cinco años con la tienda, dice sentirse orgullosa por mantenerla tantos años y espera hacerla prosperar más, y con ello tener un futuro asegurado, el crédito que solicitó es para materia prima  y tener más surtida la tienda.
La señora Margarita M. G., tiene un taller de costura desde hace cinco años, menciona le gusta el oficio de costurera desde muy pequeña y de grande decidió dedicarse a este negocio, hace todo tipo de costuras desde la confección hasta una simple reparación de alguna prenda, menciona que gracias a la costura ella ha salido adelante sus vecinos dicen que hace muy buenos trabajos es por eso que mucha gente la busca. Con el crédito dará mantenimiento a sus máquinas para poder seguir dando buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Las Amistosas” (The Friendly Ladies) group decided on this name because all of its members consider themselves to be happy and sociable.  They all get along very well and this is why they decided to form this group and request a loan.  This group is located in the State of Mexico.

Martha García R. has a grocery store, which was born from her restlessness of not having a job, but as time passed, she became more interested in her grocery store business.  She’s been running this store for five years and tells us that she is proud to have had it for so many years and she hopes to make it more successful and secure a better future for herself.  She requested this loan to buy inventory items in order to stock her store better.

Margarita M. G. has had a tailor shop for five years.  She tells us that she has enjoyed this trade since she was a little girl, and as an adult decided to dedicate herself to this business.  She does all kinds of sewing, from making clothing to simple repairs.  She also tells us that she’s been able to get ahead because of this.  Her neighbors say that she does very good work and that many people seek her out.  She will use the money from this loan to perform maintenance on her sewing machines so that she can continue to give good service to her customers.

loans.use: Supplies and inventory

loans.name: Odilie

texts.es: Odilie tiene 29 años, ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio mantener a sus 2 hijos menores de edad le ha sido muy difícil, su esposo le ayuda a cargar todos los diferentes productos que ofrece.  Este negocio es muy rentable para ella por lo que ha sido su medio de trabajo el entusiasmo que ofrece a sus clientes es muy importante. El crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, sabanas, cosméticos entre otros así podrá seguir ofreciendo una gran variedad.
texts.en:
Odilie is 29 years old, sells general merchandise, and has had this business for more than four years, but it’s been difficult to support her two minor children.  Her husband helps her carry the products she sells.

This business is very profitable for her and the enthusiasm she offers her customers is very important.  She will use the money from this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, sheets, and cosmetics, among other things.  This way she can continue to offer a large variety of items.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza 1 Y 2 Group

texts.es:
Manuela es una de los miembros del Grupo Luz de la esperanza 1 & 2 , ellos son microempresarios dedicados a las ventas de ropa, productos naturales, zapatos, educacion, etc; en la ciudad de San Pedro de Macoris, una ciudad famosa por sus jugadores de pelota y por la industria azucarera, su economía actual depende de la Zona franca, la industria del cemento y otras actividades menores como el turismo. Está asociada de Esperanza se dedica a la educacion, tiene una pequeña escuela en su comunidad, esta recibiendo su segundo prestamos para invertirlo en libros, y sillas, ya que necesita invertir en utiles y hacer algunos cambios y arreglos. 

Manuela va a utilizar sus ganancias para seguir invertir en su negocio, ya que es mucho lo que le falta lograr para tener una buena estructura pero nos dice que gracias a los prestamos va a poder creciendo. Su reto mas dificil educar y criar a sus hijos a la ves que estudiaba y trabajaba. Su sueño es poder ofrecer la mejor educacion de su comunidad, y que a la vez pueda constribuir con los demas.
texts.en:
Manuela is one of the members of Grupo Luz de la Esperanza 1 & 2.  They are micro-businesses dedicated to selling clothing, natural products, shoes, education, etc. in the city of San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for soccer players and for the sugar refinery business.  The city’s economy is currently dependent on the “Free Zone”, the cement industry, and to some degree other industries such as tourism.  Manuela dedicates herself to education and has a small school in her community.  She is receiving her second loan, which she will use to invest in books and seats.  She also needs to invest in school supplies and make some changes and repairs.


Manuela will use her profits to continue investing in her business, since there is a lot she needs to achieve in order to improve the school.  However, she tells us that thanks to the loans that her business is going to keep growing.  Her most difficult challenge is to educate and raise her children since they have to study and work at the same time.  Her dream is to be able to offer the best education for her community and at the same time to be able to contribute to the community.

loans.use: To buy books, seats, etc.

loans.name: Marvin Geovanny

texts.es:
el sr. Marvin Geovanny E. N. tiene de 29 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Josefina del Carmen Baca Dominguez quien se dedica a atender la casa y a cuidar de su hija, ayudarle en sus estudios.
don Marvin vive en la aldea Corinto desde hace 9 años dedicandose al comercio, tiene su propia casa y su actividad es el servicio de moler maiz, muchas personas vienen todos los dias temprano a moler maiz, ahora esta el credito lo utilizara para la compra de unos repuestos para el mantenimiento del molino y para comprar los pescados y los camarones.
en su carro quiere salir a vender los mariscos, ya que el servicio de moler maiz es de las 5:00 am a 9:00 am.
se desplazara hasta el municipio de Langue Valle para realizar sus ventas.
Tiene como proyecto realizar el porton enfrente de su casa.
texts.en:
Señor Marvin Geovanny E. N. is 29 years old.   He is married to Señora Josefina del Carmen Baca Dominguez who stays at home to manage their household and care for their daughter and help her with her studies.  Don Marvin has been living in the Corinto community for 9 years where he owns his own house and runs his business milling corn.  Every day many people come early to mill corn.  

He will use the loan to buy parts to maintain his mill and also, to buy fish and shrimp.  He wants to use his car to drive around selling seafood since he only mills corn from 5:00 until 9:00 every morning.  He will travel to the town of Langue Valle to sell his products.  He would like install a gate in the front of his house.

loans.use: To purchase parts to maintain his mill and also to purchase fish and shrimp

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For the purchase of agricultural chemicals and nutrients

loans.name: Rosalia Ramona

texts.es: Rosalía es una mujer emprendedora, con mucho deseo de seguir trabajando ella tiene 35 años. Su negocio que inicio hace 6 años que es la venta de frutas y verduras ha logrado prosperar debido a su buena administración en su negocio. Ya que cuando inicio lo hizo con poco dinero y con ayuda de su esposo, fue así que lograr captar sus clientes, y es con lo que ha alimentado actualmente este crédito es para la compra de mangos, sandias, naranjas y entre otras. Ella sueña con mejorar su condición de vida y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Rosalía is an enterprising woman with strong motivation to keep working. She is 35 years old. She started her business selling fruits and vegetables six years ago and has prospered owing to her good management of her business. She started out with little money and the help of her husband. In this way she succeeded at attracting her customers and has provided sustenance for her family. Currently this loan is for the purchase of mangoes, watermelons and oranges among others. She dreams of improving her living conditions and growing her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For the purchase of agricultural nutrients and chemicals

loans.name: Topacio Group

texts.es:
La Asociación  Comunal “TOPACIO” está solicitando crédito por primera vez, en el Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón, esta asociación se reunirá cada quincena.  La frecuencia de reuniones permite que las integrantes de la asociación se conozcan mejor,  con un riesgo menor, pues generalmente los montos del primer crédito son bajos.   La mesa directiva está compuesta por la señora  Luisa  como presidenta, la señora Fabiola como tesorera y como secretaria de actas la señora María.

La señora  Luisa es una mujer de 30 años de edad, ha sido nombrada  presidenta con la seguridad de que cumplirá con responsabilidad sus funciones.   Con respecto a su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de edredones, desde hace tres años, aprendió el negocio de un tío que también vende el mismo producto.  La señora Luisa solicitó Bs.2000.- , pensando en ampliar el negocio y comprar sábanas, ollas y cosméticos.

Los negocios  que llevan adelante el resto de integrantes de la asociación son variados: venta de cosméticos líneas AVON; Yanbal, venta de ropa para niño, venta de verduras venta de ropa, venta de aceite lubricante, venta de ropa deportiva y  tienda de joyas.
texts.en:
The communal bank “TOPACIO” is requesting their first loan  in El Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación.  The group is made up of eight members, seven women and one man.  They meet every two weeks.  The frequency of their meetings allows them to get to know each other better, creating less risk, however, the amounts of first time loans are generally small.  The board consists of Señora Luisa, president, Señora Fabiola, treasurer and Señora Maria as recording secretary.  

Señora Luisa is a 30 year old woman and has been named president with the assurance that she will fulfill her duties responsibly.  She has been selling quilts for a living for the last three years, learning  the business from her uncle who also sells quilts.  Señora Luisa is requesting Bs. 2000 (Bolivianos - Bolivian currency) because she is planning to expand her business and buy sheets, cookware and cosmetics.  

The other members of the group engage in various other activities:  Avon cosmetics sales, Yanbal personal products sales, children's clothing sales, vegetable sales, clothing sales, lubricant sales, athletic clothing sales, and a jewelry store.

loans.use: To purchase sheets, cookware and cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For the purchase of agricultural chemicals and nutrients

loans.name: Rosa Alicia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa C. es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive en la comunidad de San Isidro que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle,  su población se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura que es  para su consumo y el sobrante lo vende, mucha de su población ha emigrado en busca de un mejor futuro de vida para sus familias.

Nuestra socia es negociante de cerdos, actividad que la realiza desde que tenia 17 años, también en su casa se dedica a la cría de cuyes y ganado, siembra hortalizas, maíz, etc., que es  para el consumo de su hogar. Ocasionalmente sus conocidas le llaman para que labore en la agricultura.
 
La Señora. Rosa tiene 53 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 25, 22, 19, 15 y 11 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independientemente, su segundo y tercer hijo trabajan y ayudan  en la economía de su hogar, su cuarto hijo también trabaja y lo poco que gana lo ha invertido en un curso de informática y recibe las clases los días sábados y su ultimo hijo está estudiando en una escuela de la comunidad, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, con el trabajo de varios años han logrado construir su casa propia.

Es socia de la banca hace 8 años, el nuevo crédito que recibe de la fundación Espoir lo va  a invertir en la compra de más cerdos para su negocio.
 
Su meta es  agrandar su casa para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosa C. is a member of El Cisne (The Swan) community bank. She lives in the community of San Isidro, which is in the parish of Valle. The people there raise animals and agriculture, and they sell the surplus. Much of the population has emigrated in search of a better future for their families.

This businesswoman has raised pigs since she was 17 years old. She also raises guinea pigs and livestock and grows vegetables, corn, etc. for her family. Sometimes, her friends and family call her to help with their crops.

Mrs. Rosa is 53 years old, is married, and has 5 children, who are 25, 22, 19, 15, and 11 years old. Her oldest daughter is married and lives independently. Her second and third children work and help with the family’s finances. Her fourth child also works, and the little that he earns, he has invested in an information technology course; he goes to class on Saturday. Her youngest child is studying in a school in the community. Her husband work in agriculture, and with many years of work, they have succeeded in building their own house.

She has been a member of the back for 8 years. This new loan from La Fundación Espoir will be invested to buy more pigs for her business.

Her goal is to make her house bigger for her children.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Felix Manuel

texts.es:
Félix es un padre de familia de 47 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos. Se dedica desde hace 20 años a la venta de frutas y verduras. Usualmente comercializa estos productos en el mercado negocio que le ayuda a solventar sus gastos personales y sacar adelante a su familia.Por ello ha solicitado este crédito para la compra de materia prima.
Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y confianza.
texts.en:
Félix is a 47 year old father who lives with his wife and kids. He has sold fruit and vegetables for 20 years. He usually markets his products in a market business, and this helps him cover his personal expenses and get his family ahead in life. He is requesting this loan to purchase produce. 

His greatest wish is to continue growing as a businessman in order to improve his quality of life and that of his family. His is highly trusted and esteemed by those that know him.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Rosa Luisa

texts.es:
la señora Rosa Luisa B. M. tiene 49 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos que dependan de ella, vive con una nieta de un año, radica en la comunidad del Caimito desde hace 47 años y se dedica al comercio a realizado varios negocios como ser venta de golosinas, mariscos y actualmente vende ropa nueva, sandalias, zapatos, frijoles, maiz, arroz, azucar.
 
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi tener mas variedad de ropa, dentro de dos meses es la epoca de mas movimiento en ventas y quiere estar preparada para cuando llegue el momento.
Rosa nos comento sentirse muy feliz ya que todo le esta saliendo bien y que su nieta esta creciendo saludable.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosa Luisa B. M. is 49 years old, single, and doesn’t have children that depend on her. She lives with her one-year-old granddaughter. She has lived in the community of Caimito for 47 years, and she pursues many businesses including selling sweets and seafood. At present, she sells clothing, sandals, shoes, beans, corn, rice, and sugar.

This loan will be used to buy more merchandise, so that she will have a larger variety of clothing. The season of high sales is approaching, and she wants to be prepared. Rosa feels very happy that everything is going well and that her granddaughter is healthy.

loans.use: To buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, sandals, shoes, beans, corns, rice, and sugar

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
La Señora Rosalina I. es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive en la comunidad de Chilcapamba que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle,  su población se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura que es para su consumo y el sobrante lo venden, mucha de su población ha  emigrado en busca de un mejor futuro de vida para sus familias.

Doña Rosalina tiene 63 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijas que son mayores de edad, son  casadas y viven  independientes, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y gracias al trabajo, empeño y esfuerzo en su juventud han logrado construir su casa propia.

La Señora. Rosalinda se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar en donde cría cuyes, cerdos y vacas de las cuales obtiene la leche que es para su consumo y para la venta, el negocio de los chanchos lo viene realizando hace un año.
 
Es socia de la banca comunal hace 2 años, se ha beneficiado mucho ya que con los créditos de la fundación ha logrado mantener su negocio.  Su nuevo crédito lo va  a invertir en  la compra de cerdos para el negocio. 
 
Su meta el crecer más en el negocio.
texts.en:
Rosalina I. is a member of the communal bank El Cisne [The Swan] and lives in the community of Chilcapamba which belongs to the del Valle parish. Hers is a farming community where they practice animal husbandry and agriculture for consumption and the remainder being sold. Many of the people here have emigrated in search of a better future for their families. 

Rosalina, 63, is married and has three adult daughters who are married and live independently. Her husband works in agriculture and thanks to the work, effort and dedication of their youth they have been able to build their own home. 

Rosalinda manages the household duties including raising guinea pigs, pigs and cows from which she gets milk for consumption and for sale. She has been raising pigs for one year. 

She has been a member of the communal bank for two years and has been greatly benefited since with the foundation's loans she has been able to maintain her business. Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of pigs for the business. 

Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: To purchase pigs

loans.name: G.s. Moises Group

texts.es: La señora Tomasa tiene 30 años es casada y tiene tres hijos, todos menores de edad. La señora se dedica a la venta de productos varios, es decir peines, colas, aros, prensa pelos, etc. Ella ya tiene más de 5 años de estar trabajando en esta actividad, vendiendo ambulante en los departamentos de Managua, Carazo, Rivas Masaya y Granada. Cabe señalarse, el negocio surgió con recursos propios, vendiendo en las calles con una bolsa, empezó el negocio debido a la necesidad de mantener a sus hijos. Ella solicita este crédito para invertirlo en comprar más cosméticos y otros artículos para vendérselos a su clientela que ahora es bastante que le encargan. Otra integrante del grupo es la Blanca Rosa tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos, dos de ellos menores de edad. La señora Blanca se dedica a la venta de artículos varios como frutas, gaseosas, golosinas, cosméticos, etc. Cabe señalarse, este negocio dio inicio desde hace mas de 20 años con poco inventario, poco a poco ha ido incrementando su capital hasta llegar a vender frutas y verduras en la cual necesita tener suficiente dinero para comprar una cosecha y trasladarla al mercado para vender. Ella solicita este crédito para invertirlo en su negocio comprando frutas,  esto con el objetivo de ampliarlo y obtener más ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Tomasa, 30, is married and has three children, all of them minors. She works selling various products, that is, combs, glue, earrings, hair clips,  etc. She has had this business for more than five years and sells door to door in the departments of Managua, Carazo, Rivas, Masaya and Granada. It is worth mentioning that she started the business using her own resources, selling in the street out of a bag. She began the business out of the necessity of supporting her children. She is seeking this loan to invest in the purchase of more cosmetics and other items for her customers as there are quite a few now who buy from her.  

Another member of the group is Blanca Rosa, 51, who is married and has four children, two of them minors. Blanca works selling various items such as fruit, soft drinks, candy, cosmetics, etc. It bears mentioning that this business had its beginning more than 20 years ago with minimal inventory. Little by little she has added to her capital to the point at which now she sells fruits and vegetables for which she requires sufficient money to be able to buy a harvest and transport it to market for sale. She is seeking this loan to invest in her business by buying fruit in order to grow her business and obtain more financial income.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Agueda Candelaria

texts.es:
En los Arenales de la parroquia Crucita cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 6 de Julio. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

La señora Candelaria es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal, ya son 19 ciclos que ha realizado sus créditos en esta institución y esta muy a gusto por aquello ya que según dice es el único lugar donde realiza sus créditos sin tantos requisitos. Tiene 54 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y tiene seis hijos mayores de edad, con ella vive un nieto de 9 años que es como su hijo. El esposo ya no trabaja es jubilado.

Tiene una tienda de víveres de consumo,  trabaja  todos los días desde las 6am hasta las 20h00, dice que no le incomoda vender hasta  más tarde ya que tiene su negocio en su casa, vende de todo desde productos de primera necesidad hasta bebidas alcohólicas y tarjetas telefónicas, trabaja con la ayuda de su nieto y su esposo, sus productos los compra en Portoviejo.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar mercadería para surtir más su tienda.
 
Sus sueños son ver que su nieto sea un buen profesional y seguir creciendo cada día más.
texts.en:
In Arenales in the church Crucita every fifteen days the communal bank 6 de Julio gathers. This location is known for its beautiful beaches, which are visited by many tourists, both national and international. It offers a diversity of beautiful locations and a rich variety of typical regional meals. 

Candelaria is the founding member of the communal bank. Already they have completed 19 loan cycles with this institution and she is very comfortable with that because according to her it is the only place which completes their loans without too many requirements. Candelaria is 54 years old, is in a civil union relationship and has six grown children. She lives with a grandson who is 9 years old and is like her son. Her husband doesn't work as he is retired.

She has a store with food supplies and works every day from 6am to 8pm. She says that it doesn't inconvenience her to sell her products so late because her business is in her house. She sells everything from basic necessities to alcohol and telephone cards. She works with the help of her grandson and her husband and she buys the products in Portoviejo. 

She will use this loan to buy merchandise to supply her store.
 
Her dream is to see her grandson become a good professional and to continue growing every day.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, eggs, meat and general supplies.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El señor Julio Cesar tiene 61 años, esta no es la primer vez que realiza financiamientos. Su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general hace mas de 14 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que conoce muy bien lo que sus clientes le solicitan.  A pesar de su edad tiene todas las energías y ganas de salir adelante por lo que busca la forma de  sobrevivir. El recorre todo los días las calles bajo este inmenso sol, logrando obtener nuevos clientes. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materia prima como sandalias, ropa, cosméticos entere otros.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 61 years old, and this is not his first loan.  He sells general merchandise, and he has been in this business for over 14 years.  Therefore, he really knows what his customers want.

In spite of his age, he has much energy and the desire to get ahead as he looks for the way to survive.  Every day he travels the streets under the interminable sun, and he manages to get new customers.

The loan he is requesting is to buy raw material like sandals, clothes, and cosmetics, among other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: José Wilder

texts.es:
José Wilder es un padre de familia de 22 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y a su pequeña hija de un año de edad en el sector Colector del distrito de San José, un distrito que se encuentra ubicado a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno lechero desde hace cuatro años. El extrae diariamente la leche que producen sus vacas y la vende a un acopiador de la zona, para asegurarse una buena producción el alimenta a sus vacas con alimento balanceado y pastos naturales que el mismo se encrga de sembrar y cosechar. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para mantener a su familia y sacarlos adelante.

José desea brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de pastos para así poder garantizarle a sus vacas el alimento que necesitan para producir leche de calidad. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1300 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de forraje.

José es un hombre emprendedor y que desea dar lo mejor de si para sacar adelante a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para otorgarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. En la imagen aparece junto a su hija.
texts.en:
José Wilder is a 22 year old family man.  He lives with his wife and their little one year old daughter.  They live in the Colector sector in the San José district.  This district is 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

He has been raising dairy cows for four years.  He milks his cows daily, and he sells the milk to an area milk consolidator.  In order to assure a good production, he feeds his cows balanced animal feed.  He also feeds them fodder, which he takes charge of planting and harvesting.  He uses the income from this activity to support his family and to get his family ahead.

José wishes to provide maintenance to the fodder that he grows.  This is to be able to guarantee that his cows get the food they need to produce quality milk.  In order to achieve this objective, he has seen the need of asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan for 1,300 soles.  He plans to use the loan to provide maintenance to his pasture.

José is an enterprising man who wishes to give the best of himself in order to get his family ahead.  His greatest desire is to keep growing as a business man so that he can give his family a better quality of life.

He appears in the photo with his daughter.

loans.use: Maintenance expenses for his pasture in order to improve feed for the dairy cows

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 65 años de edad, es viuda y vive junto a una de sus hijos en el distrito pesquero de San José, una zona pesquera que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicado a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años al procesamiento y comercialización de pescado seco – salado. Ella adquiere el pescado a los pescadores del lugar o se dirige al terminal pesquero de la zona, luego lo procesa y lo deja secar para luego venderlo en los principales mercados de la zona. El negocio le permite sentirse activa y con el ayuda a sostener a su familia por lo que siempre trata de brindar todo su esfuerzo para sacarlo adelante.

Juana desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más pescado fresco, de ese modo puede procesar más y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Juana es una mujer que se ha caracterizado toda su vida por bastante trabajora y responsable. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser una cliente puntual y responsable al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Juana is a 65 year old widow.  She lives with one of her children in the San José fishing district. This district is a fishing zone, which belongs to the Lambayeque province.  It is located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She has been processing and selling dried and salted fish for ten years.  She gets the fish from local fishermen or she goes to the area’s fish terminal.  Then she processes it and lets it dry.  She later sells it to the main markets in the area.  The business allows her to feel active, and it helps support her family.  She always puts forth all of her efforts in order to get her family ahead.

Juana wishes to expand her business by purchasing more fresh fish.  This way she will be able to process more fish and get greater income from her sales.  That is why she believes it is advisable to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  

Juana is known to be a very hard working and responsible woman.  She has previously worked with Edpyme Alternative, and she has demonstrated herself to be punctual and responsible with her payments.

loans.use: To buy fish to process and sell as dried and salted fish

loans.name: Karin Lily

texts.es:
Karin es una madre de familia de 36 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus tres hijos y vive en la zona urbana del distrito de Nueva Arica una comunidad pequeña dedicada principalmente a la agricultura, se encuentra situada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de 5 años a la venta de cerveza y gaseosas en su propio domicilio, el negocio es uno de los pocos que existen en la zona por lo que siempre cuenta con clientes que atender. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Karin se encuentra solicitando por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un prestamo de 2000 nuevos soles con los cuales desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos, de modo que pueda hacerlo crecer y con los nuevos ingresos que obtenga pueda mejorar su calidad de vida.

Karin es una mujer bastante tranquila y responsable. En la zona donde vive sus vecinos y conocidos dan buenas referencias de ella y la consideran una persona de confianza.
texts.en:
Karin is 36 years old, the mother of a family, and lives with her husband and their 3 children. She resides in the urban zone of Nueva Arica district. This is a small community dedicated principally to agriculture, and it's located 1 ½ hours from the city of Chiclayo.

For over 5 years, Karin has been selling beer and soft drinks from her own home.  The business is one of the few existing in the zone, which is why it always has customers to attend to.  The income she receives from this activity is used to help her husband sustain the family economy.

This is the 1st time that Karin has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa.  She needs 2,000 new sols to expand her business, acquiring more products to make it grow. The new income she will obtain should improve her quality of life.

Karin is a very stable and responsible woman.  In the zone where she lives, her neighbors and acquaintances give her good references and consider her a trustworthy person.

loans.use: BUYING BEER AND DRINKS TO EXPAND HER SALES BUSINESS IN HER HOME

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David tiene 35 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive junto a su madre en el sector Caminos del Inca, una comunidad rural pequeña del distrito de Zaña, conocido por sus tradiciones y costumbres afro – peruanas, se encuentra ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace seis meses a brindar el servicio de transporte en una mototaxi (vehículo consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para brindar servicio de transporte), el adquirió el vehículo gracias a sus ahorros y desde entonces brinda su servicio en la ciudad de Cayalti y sus anexos, los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su madre con el sostenimiento del hogar.

David desea realizar algunas mejoras en casa de su madre, ya que su mayor anhelo es  mejorar gradualmente su calidad de vida, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su objetivo.

David es un hombre trabajador y que siempre da lo mejor de si para sacar a su familia adelante. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
David is 35, single with no children and lives with his mother in the small rural community  of Caminos del Inca in the Zaña district. This area is known for it's Afro-Peruvian traditions and is located an hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

For the past 6 months he has made a living with his motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with an attached covered cabin used for transportation). He purchased the vehicle with his savings and since then has been offering his services in and around the city of Cayalti. He uses the income from this activity to cover his personal expenses and help his mother with the household expenses. 

David wants to make some improvements to his mother's home since his wish is to gradually improve her quality of life. For that reason he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa  in the amount of 1000 Nuevos Soles to help him meet his goals. David is a hardworking man that always gives his best to help his family. Those who know him consider him to be easy-going and responsible.

loans.use: Purchase materials for improvements to his mother's home

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto es un padre de familia de 43 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a su hija en el distrito agrícola de Oyotún , una zona caracterizada por poseer una geografía bastante accidentada debido a que se encuentra cerca de la sierra norte del país.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, el cría diversos animales en su domicilio alimentándolos de granos y forraje, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en una feria que toma lugar en el cercano distrito de Cayaltí una vez a la semana. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad el se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.

Humberto desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y alimento para poder aumentar su nivel de ventas y de esa manera percibir mas ingresos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar esta acción.

Humberto es una persona tranquila, responsable y muy trabajadora. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien respetable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Humberto is the father of a family, 43 years of age, who lives with his wife and daughter in the agricultural district of Oyotún, an area known for having a rather dramatic geography, as it is located in the northern mountains of the country. 

He is dedicated to the breeding and sale of smaller animals.  He raises diverse kinds of animals in his home, feeding them grain and fodder.  When they have reached a good level of development, he offers them for sale in the outdoor market that takes place in the nearby district of Cayaltí once a week. With the profits that he earns from this activity he takes charge of moving his family ahead. 

Humberto would like to grow his business with the purchase of more animals and feed in order to be able to increase his level of sales and in this manner obtain greater profits.  For this reason he has found it necessary to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa, a loan of 1000 new soles which will help him carry out this action.

Humberto is a peaceful, responsible and hard-working person. The people who know him consider him someone who is respectable and trustworthy.

loans.use: To buy animals and food to grow his business

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es:
Cirilo es un padre de familia de 49 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el distrito agrícola de Oyotún, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a la crianza y venta de animales menores en su domicilio. El cría los animales alimentándolos de forraje y alimento balanceado. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta en una feria que toma lugar en el distrito de Cayaltí una vez por semana. Con estos ingresos el saca adelante a su familia por lo que siempre trata de manejar su actividad del mejor modo posible.

Cirilo desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para poder ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos al momento de vender sus animales. Esto les permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Para realizar su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Cirilo es una persona tranquila y bastante trabajadora. Las personas que le conocen tienen muy buenas referencias de él y asimismo le consideran alguien  responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Cirilo is the father of a family, 49 years of age, who lives with his wife and their children in the agricultural district of Oyotún, an area located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

He has been dedicated for 10 years to the raising and sale of small animals at his home.  He raises the animals, feeding them fodder and balanced feed.  When they have reached a good level of development he offers them for sale at an outdoor market that takes place in the district of Cayaltí once a week. With the profits he moves his family forward, which is why he always tries to manage this activity in the best way possible. 

Cirilo would like to acquire more animals and balanced feed in order to grow his business and obtain greater profits when selling his animals.  This will permit him to improve the quality of life for his family.  To realize this objective, he has it found it necessary to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa; a loan of 1000 new soles.

Cirilo is a peaceful and very hard-working person.  The people who know him give him good references and likewise consider him someone responsible and trustworthy.

loans.use: To buy animals and balanced feed to grow his business.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.es:
Evelina tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en el distrito agrícola de Oyotún, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a la crianza y venta de animales menores en su domicilio. Ella cría todo tipo de animales menores alimentándolos de forraje y alimento balanceado. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta en una feria que toma lugar en el distrito de Cayaltí una vez por semana o a los negociantes que frecuentan la zona en donde vive. Con estos ingresos ella solventa sus gastos personales y ayuda a sus padres con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Evelina desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para poder ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos al momento de venderlos. Esto les permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Para realizar su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Evelina es una mujer tranquila y bastante trabajadora. Las personas que le conocen tienen muy buenas referencias de ella y asimismo le consideran una joven de confianza.
texts.en:
Evelina is 29 years of age.  She is single and lives with her parents and brothers in the agricultural district of Oyotún, a zone located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She has been dedicated for 10 years to the raising and sale of small animals at her home.  She raises all types of small animals, feeding them fodder and balanced feed.  When they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale at an outdoor market that takes place in the district of Cayaltí once a week or to the businesses that frequent the zone where she lives.  With the profits she pays her personal expenses and helps her parents with sustaining the family economy.  

Evelina would like to acquire more animals and balanced diet in order to grow her business and receive greater profits when selling her animals. This will allow her to improve the quality of life for her family.  To realize this objective, she has found it necessary to request her first loan from Edpyme Alternativa; a loan of 2000 new soles.

Evelina is a peaceful and very hard working woman.  The people who know her give her good references and likewise consider her a trustworthy young woman.

loans.use: To buy animals and feed to grow her business.

loans.name: Alexander Baltazar

texts.es:
Alexander tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en el sector Ladrillera del distrito agrícola de Oyotún, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde que era adolescente a la fabricación y venta de ladrillos en la zona donde vive. El ayuda a los fabricantes con la elaboración de este material de construcción y lo distribuye por pedidos a los diversos clientes que residen por la zona. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad el solventa sus gastos personales y ayuda a sus padres con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Alexander desea adquirir material para seguir fabrincando ladrillos, para realizar su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

El es un joven tranquilo y bastante trabajador. Las personas que le conocen tienen muy buenas referencias suyas y asimismo le consideran un joven de confianza.
texts.en:
Alexander is 26 years of age.  He is single and lives with his parents and brothers in the Ladrillera agricultural district of Oyotún, a zone located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

He has been dedicated since he was a teenager to the manufacture and sale of bricks in the zone where he lives.  He helps builders with the making of this material and distributes it to order to the diverse clients that reside in the zone.  With the income that he earns from this activity, he settles his personal expenses and helps his parents with the support of the family economy.  

Alexander would like to acquire material to continue making bricks.  To achieve his objective, he has found it necessary to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternative; a loan of 500 new soles.  

He is a quite industrious and tranquil youth.  The people that know him give him very good references and likewise they consider him a trustworthy young man.

loans.use: To buy materials to grow his business of making and selling bricks.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 49 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el sector Las Delicias del distrito agrícola de Oyotún, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde muy joven a trabajar en labores agrícolas, el cuenta con una pequeña extensión de terreno agrícola en el cual suele sembrar arroz, este producto es el principal cultivo de la zona y sólo allí se siembra dos veces por año, ya que en el resto de lugares se siembra sólo una vez. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad el solventa sus gastos personales y ayuda a sus padres con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

José desea adquirir algunos fertilizantes y herbicidas con los cuales planea brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo. Para realizar esta acción ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

El es un padre bastante entregado a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
José is the father of a family, 49 years of age, who resides with his wife and children in the Las Delicias sector of the agricultura district of Oyotún, a zone located a hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

Since he was very young, he has been dedicated to working in agriculture.  He relies on a small extension of agricultural landin which is used to raise rice. This product is the main crop of the zone, which only there is sown two times per year.  In the rest of the area rice is sown only once per year.  With the income that he earns from this activity he settles his personal expenses and helps with the support of the family economy.  

José would like to acquire some fertilizers and herbicides with which he plans to maintain his crop.  To carry out this action he has found it convenient to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternative; a loan of 500 new soles.  

He is a good father to his family.  His greatest wish is to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides to continue growing his crop of rice.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo es un padre de familia de 41 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el distrito agrícola de Oyotún, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a la crianza y venta de animales menores en su domicilio. El cría los animales alimentándolos de forraje y alimento balanceado. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta en una feria que toma lugar en el distrito de Cayaltí una vez por semana, eventualmente la ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona. Con estos ingresos el saca adelante a su familia por lo que siempre trata de manejar su actividad del mejor modo posible.

Segundo desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para poder ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos al momento de vender sus animales. Esto les permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Para realizar su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
